00019 #ifndef _POSIX_MONITOR_H
00020 #define _POSIX_MONITOR_H
00021 
00022 #include <asm/xenomai/atomic.h>
00023 
00024 #define COBALT_MONITOR_MAGIC 0x86861111
00025 
00026 #define COBALT_MONITOR_GRANTED    0x01
00027 #define COBALT_MONITOR_DRAINED    0x02
00028 #define COBALT_MONITOR_SIGNALED   0x03 /* i.e. GRANTED or DRAINED */
00029 #define COBALT_MONITOR_BROADCAST  0x04
00030 #define COBALT_MONITOR_PENDED     0x08
00031 
00032 struct cobalt_monitor_data {
00033         xnarch_atomic_t owner;
00034         unsigned long flags;
00035 };
00036 
00037 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00038 
00039 #include <nucleus/synch.h>
00040 
00041 struct cobalt_kqueues;
00042 
00043 struct cobalt_monitor {
00044         unsigned int magic;
00045         struct xnsynch gate;
00046         struct xnsynch drain;
00047         struct cobalt_monitor_data *data;
00048         struct cobalt_kqueues *owningq;
00049         struct xnholder link;
00050         struct xnqueue waiters;
00051         int flags;
00052 };
00053 
00054 int cobalt_monitor_init(struct cobalt_monitor_shadow __user *u_monsh,
00055                         int flags);
00056 
00057 int cobalt_monitor_enter(struct cobalt_monitor_shadow __user *u_monsh);
00058 
00059 int cobalt_monitor_sync(struct cobalt_monitor_shadow __user *u_monsh);
00060 
00061 int cobalt_monitor_exit(struct cobalt_monitor_shadow __user *u_monsh);
00062 
00063 int cobalt_monitor_wait(struct cobalt_monitor_shadow __user *u_monsh,
00064                         int event, const struct timespec __user *u_ts,
00065                         int __user *u_ret);
00066 
00067 int cobalt_monitor_destroy(struct cobalt_monitor_shadow __user *u_monsh);
00068 
00069 void cobalt_monitorq_cleanup(struct cobalt_kqueues *q);
00070 
00071 void cobalt_monitor_pkg_init(void);
00072 
00073 void cobalt_monitor_pkg_cleanup(void);
00074 
00075 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00076 
00077 #endif /* !_POSIX_MONITOR_H */
